name: RainonUmbrella
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Umbrella”
”Alexa ask Rain on Umbrella to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on umbrella
des:
Rain on Umbrella offers the unique sound of rain hitting an umbrella. This creates a personal, intimate ambiance, reminiscent of walking in the rain with protection, hearing the raindrops drum lightly above your head.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Umbrella
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
